EmailTemplate.name: Promo | Digital Library
EmailTemplate.subject: Build your own compliance library
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}, want six more reasons to subscribe to Compliance Week? Read on. We're offering a special Compliance Week package -- a one-year subscription for $799 (regularly $1,199) plus six back issues (May through October 2013). Just send me an email.
Subscribing brings a host of benefits, including unlimited access to hundreds of articles, a choice of up to five weekly newsletters, monthly digital magazine, propriety databases, and more. Hurry -- special discount subscription package expires June 30th.
Compliance Week 77 N Washington St Fl 4 Boston, MA 02114-1908 USA
